titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

body.ab:
1933 MEYER Oct 5 Chez Mme Odier 290 79 Bd Montmorency Miss Florence Meyer Chez Madame Ronceret 5 rue de l'Od√©on AUT: 37-25 100v. 3 mos 2 vols 25 25 de dep. 100 see account card made a mistake she owes 45v more Oct 5 As I lay Dying Oct 7 7 Sound & The Fury Oct 12 12 History of Russian Revolution v1 Oct 27 ren to 28 Oct Broome Stages ren Oct 27 31 Devil in the Flesh Nov 4 Life of the Bee Nov 4 Nov 4 In the American Grain ren Nov 20 Golden Bough ren Nov 20 paid 45f balanc due on subsc. Nov 22 Counterfeiters ren. BB Napoleon, Mereszkorvsky Nov 28 Dec 4 Winner take Nothing (2nd copy) BB 19 Possessed Dec 23 19 Stavrogin's Confession extra Dec 23 owes Art of Pantomime 15/ Dec 27 Etruscan Places.
